description: Request to check in an item at a service point (including when a loan is returned)

itemBarcode.description: Barcode of the item to be checked in

servicePointId.description: Service point where the item is being processed

checkInDate.description: When the item was checked in

claimedReturnedResolution.description: Describes how the library resolved the situation where an item that was claimed returned

sessionId.description: Randomly generated UUID which must be the same for all check-in requests issued in scope of the same check-in session
